title: Property in the UK for expats: fractional ownership options
text: Expat Property Property in the UK for expats: fractional ownership options For those who want a relaxing place to rest their head during trips home, here are some investment options â€“ from rural lodges to luxury apartments Dream Lodge Group's Woodlands Park development in East Sussex is a collection of lodge homes - some with hot tubs - surrounded by fields and woodlands Photo: Dream Lodge Group
